feed.title: theausinstitute TikTok
feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from theausinstitute

entry.title: We've come up with four ways to make the Stage 3 tax cuts fairer, giving 80% of taxpayers a bigger slice of the pie. Oh, and we'd still have enough money left over to increase JobSeeker to $250 a fortnight, while spending less than the Stage 3 tax cuts.
entry.content: We've come up with four ways to make the Stage 3 tax cuts fairer, giving 80% of taxpayers a bigger slice of the pie. Oh, and we'd still have enough money left over to increase JobSeeker to $250 a fortnight, while spending less than the Stage 3 tax cuts. Read the full report here on our website, link in bio. #auspol #economics

entry.title: ❌ Enough is enough. Our democracy is too important to let lies & misinformation run rampant. ✅ We need truth in political advertising laws before the next federal election. South Australia & ACT already have truth in political advertising laws that work.
entry.content: ❌ Enough is enough. Our democracy is too important to let lies & misinformation run rampant. ✅ We need truth in political advertising laws before the next federal election. South Australia & ACT already have truth in political advertising laws that work. "Different opinions are inevitable, but we shouldn't let people deliberately mislead others," "Democracy is too important to let ppl do it deliberate harm." said Richard Denniss. #auspol

entry.title: The PM has said that "everyone" earning over $45k "benefits" from the Stage 3 tax cuts. But what you can get for your tax cut looks verrrrry different depending on how much you make.... Watch the full video on Youtube. #auspol
entry.content: The PM has said that "everyone" earning over $45k "benefits" from the Stage 3 tax cuts. But what you can get for your tax cut looks verrrrry different depending on how much you make.... Watch the full video on Youtube. #auspol

entry.title: Invitations for State Dinners at the White House don't come very often, so why is Albanese getting one now? And what is, and isn't, on the table for discussion? Hint: Probably AUKUS, probably not Assange. International & Security Affairs Senior Research
entry.content: Invitations for State Dinners at the White House don't come very often, so why is Albanese getting one now? And what is, and isn't, on the table for discussion? Hint: Probably AUKUS, probably not Assange. International & Security Affairs Senior Researcher Emma Shortis explains. #auspol

entry.title: What is the silliest economic modelling Richard has ever seen? Hint: it was used to spruik the Government's flawed Nature Repair Market proposal. There were many issues with the bill, most fundamentally is that markets don't value nature. They value profi
entry.content: What is the silliest economic modelling Richard has ever seen? Hint: it was used to spruik the Government's flawed Nature Repair Market proposal. There were many issues with the bill, most fundamentally is that markets don't value nature. They value profits. Here's the story of how the Government's 'Green Wall Street' crashed, with Richard Denniss. #auspol #climate #fyp #australia
